Fri, 15 Nov 2024 08:42:08 +0000 Traces of mercury chloride have been found in white powder being sold as MDMA in the Wellington region. Photo / High Alert
Air New Zealand aborts Queenstown flights on eve of Queenstown Marathon https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/air-new-zealand-aborts-queenstown-flights-on-eve-of-queenstown-marathon/ME7FZLJGG5CMRA4D7RNQ7OK2UM/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/air-new-zealand-aborts-queenstown-flights-on-eve-of-queenstown-marathon/ME7FZLJGG5CMRA4D7RNQ7OK2UM/ Nazahryth BernardThe flights were carrying hundreds of athletes ahead of Saturday morning’s race. Fri, 15 Nov 2024 08:27:37 +0000 Nathan Lee travelled from Taiwan for the Queenstown Marathon. He's pictured back at Auckland Airport after his flight from Auckland to Queenstown was aborted tonight just as the flight was due to land in Queenstown. Photo / Supplied

Photo / via video
